description:
The Candy Bag Disappears: The trio were in the treehouse one day playing with their friends. During their break, Airo notices is admiring Coron and notices that Coron forgot her Candy Bag. Then she decided to dress-up like Coron and carries the same candy bag, even trying to pretend to be her. Later at the Rainbow Fountain, Airo then saw the Black Candies and made them happy by giving them some milk. Chevy`s group arrived later on and questioned the Black Candies about the bag, but with no leads, they decided to ask Kumampa. As the three learn something from his advice, they came up with a perfect plan to catch Airo and get Coron`s bag back.
Crew and Kumampa: The trio came to Coron`s house one day to try Coron`s special Strawberry Milk as both Chevy and Panky began fighting. Crew, arrives and then tries to stop the fight and tells Chevy to pour the glasses again before he left. One day, the trio were having lunch as the Black Candies arrived and wants to join them, but the food is not enough. Crew himself came up with another solution and left. However, with them relying on Crew on their problems is starting to make Kumampa totally jealous and mad.

titles.title: Kieta Candy Bag / Crew to Kumampa
The Candy Bag Disappears / Crew and Kumampa
消えたキャンディーバッグ / クルーとクマンパ
